casebody.data:
No. 11-484. Dawn V. Martin, Petitioner v. Howard University, et al. 565 U.S. 1174, 132 S. Ct. 1096,

181 L. Ed. 2d 1009,

2012 U.S. LEXIS 636, January 17, 2012.

Motion of The National Organization for Women Foundation (NOW Foundation) for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied.
